actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to improve the criminal justice system by providing assistance to States, counties, and local governments for the construction, acquisition, and renovation of prisons.
short_title: Corrections Construction and Program Development Act

summary.text: Corrections Construction and Program Development Act - Authorizes the Attorney General to make grants to States to cover up to 75 percent of the cost of projects to: (1) acquire, construct, or improve State or local correctional facilities; or (2) improve programs and practices within such facilities.

titles.title: Corrections Construction and Program Development Act
A bill to improve the criminal justice system by providing assistance to States, counties, and local governments for the construction, acquisition, and renovation of prisons.
